files.patch: @@ -998,7 +998,7 @@ deprecated and support will be removed in the future. Type: Documentation-only -The option `produceCachedData` has been deprecated. Use +The `produceCachedData` option is deprecated. Use [`script.createCachedData()`][] instead.
